virtual void OnDisplaySms (Provider *provider, INT row, INT set_index=-1)
 It is an overloaded function which retrieves the text from the information of passed provider and row index and set the text to the MultiLineEditor.
virtual void OnLayoutClient ()

Detailed Description

SmsViewerWin is the message viewer window responsible for the display of the selected SMS content.

void SmsViewerWin::OnDisplaySms (  Provider *  provider,
INT  row,
INT  set_index = -1

It is an overloaded function which retrieves the text from the information of passed provider and row index and set the text to the MultiLineEditor.
